title: SmartGold01
author: SmartGold01
content: This na to acknowledge say we dey increase our pressure for the local board, usually na we all dey benefits because now e come dey more interested say as you drop your quality post las las Joy go follow you back, because at some point here been dey dry onto say the pressure don pass one person wey we get as merits source but as we don ginger so tay theymos no gree turn eyes for us but God use another person com give us small lift I dy see say the pressure don fall back with full force. Even self the numbers of newbies don increase this is to show say the reason we no dey make progress na because no much joy coming out from this side of board if not for brainboss and Igebotz wey dey help to give people small hope and joy if not here for no be no go area for we people since every body dey run go out go hustle how them go take grow.So like this I want to really appreciate una for coming back with full force and this na to show say very soon we go take over some board especially that of russian because them dey always dey top. This hustle no be for one person but na for everybody, weda something come out or not make we still stick here to dey do our normal task and to dey keep here clean so even though our generous giver come stop e no go worry our mind again because I know say him don try for us. Like this I really like the vibe wey dey flow smoothly here like this, so make we keep the energy moving and remain oneness as one family together you and I go grow reach were we want.Love you allSmartGold cares.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: The people were dey give me joy pass na the newbies,Â  with the level of knowledge and experience that they are displaying within a short time of them being here is something amazing and this ball down to those senior men were the bring this newbies onboard. E get the time,Â  we're we been dey experience poor performance from newbies and that time many of them eventually run into one problem or the other and at that time we start advising old members to properly give our newbies orientations before bringing them onboard,Â  and I think the positive outcome we are currently seeing is as the results of efforts put into orientation of the newbies by the older members. Some time I feel we should give the newbies some space to shine which is way this days,Â  I rather make comments than to create new discussions sake of say if old members too do,Â  you fit demoralize the newbies but if the make attempts ones or twice to start such discussions,Â  that will boost their confidence level. So the local board is doing well and good!

comments.author: SmartGold01
comments.body: Quote from: Wiwo on September 22, 2023, 10:42:43 PMThe people were dey give me joy pass na the newbies,Â  with the level of knowledge and experience that they are displaying within a short time of them being here is something amazing and this ball down to those senior men were the bring this newbies onboard. E get the time,Â  we're we been dey experience poor performance from newbies and that time many of them eventually run into one problem or the other and at that time we start advising old members to properly give our newbies orientations before bringing them onboard,Â  and I think the positive outcome we are currently seeing is as the results of efforts put into orientation of the newbies by the older members. Some time I feel we should give the newbies some space to shine which is way this days,Â  I rather make comments than to create new discussions sake of say if old members too do,Â  you fit demoralize the newbies but if the make attempts ones or twice to start such discussions,Â  that will boost their confidence level. So the local board is doing well and good! Na true you talk because I no say e no easy sha but I go still thank their people wey bring them come onboard, still on still anything wey you see say you supposed share here or any topic you know say go help the community no hesitate to share here because I believe say here na open place wey people supposed learn and we must not only seat and watch the newbies at least we are all learning together by sharing thoughts and knowledge.Giving them space be like say we too no wan contribute to the increase of the forum, but as we talk them talk here becomes more friendly to everyone to learn and grasps things across the board and that of the general board.

comments.author: Obari
comments.body: If you be woman I love you too else shift make I pass abi you never hear say no love for the boy childðŸ™„I no really go through your post as neck dey pain me to read long article like this and you for atleast try summarize your post next time especiallyÂ  for local board so we go catch this vibes properly.Well, I wan use this medium to say a big shout out to all the bannies out here as I really admire seeing more of the females in this Industry especially from this end of the world.No mind my code mixing and switching, I appreciateÂ  you too as I dey really see you on a regular for the forum and I wan tell you say,Â  you're doing well.

comments.author: CryptoHeadlineNews
comments.body: First of all, I go just like to say thank you for taking notice of the little growth wey dey get for we local board, and also thank God for bringing our helper & Savior in the person of hugeblack who came to our aid when we needed a helper so urgently due to our increasing number of newbies and high quality posters. Sir, I must say you are really God sent to Nigerian local board, and we will always keep on praying for you for good health of mind and body.Quote from: SmartGold01 on September 22, 2023, 10:18:57 PMSo like this I want to really appreciate una for coming back with full force and this na to show say very soon we go take over some board especially that of russian because them dey always dey top. If na all the Nigerians wey we get for this forum na dey drop the least 5 post each week for this local board, I don't see any reason why we no go beat Russian local board, but just that we get plenty Nigerians for here wey no dey drop a single post here months after months. But God dey shahQuote from: Obari on September 23, 2023, 12:15:32 PMI no really go through your post as neck dey pain me to read long article like this and you for atleast try summarize your post next time especially Â for local board so we go catch this vibes properly.Lolz.. @ Obari, wetin you do done use your your neck do wey neck dey pain you? So na this common post with 312 words you dey call long post, what if eh be reach 1000 words, wetin you for call am then?

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: Quote from: Obari on September 23, 2023, 12:15:32 PMIf you be woman I love you too else shift make I pass abi you never hear say no love for the boy childðŸ™„I no really go through your post as neck dey pain me to read long article like this and you for atleast try summarize your post next time especiallyÂ  for local board so we go catch this vibes properly.Well, I wan use this medium to say a big shout out to all the bannies out here as I really admire seeing more of the females in this Industry especially from this end of the world.No mind my code mixing and switching, I appreciateÂ  you too as I dey really see you on a regular for the forum and I wan to tell you say,Â  you're doing well.You be lazy reader be that,Â  and I no believe say neck dey pain and this writeup is not even embedded with enough worlds/characters to be call an article,Â  so at most this ops is still readable,Â  because I have been able to read the thread 3 time since it creation,Â  and that shows that the message is summarized enough. It f as you be now to be my brothers keeper,Â  send me your postal code,Â  make I support you with one neck belt that I pick from road side make you use support your neck make e for stand well brother  . No mind me I just dey wind you no baba,Â  but truth be told,Â  the write-up is summarized enough.

comments.author: Obari
comments.body: @wiwo no be small matter as I dey yarn oo because sincerely neck and waisted dey worry me badly and frankly I don chest am say I lazy to read but this forum dey confuse me because even guys dey ber plenty banny names but if this smartgold na truly banny then no worry I go read the op but else make I focus on massaging this neck and waistðŸ¤£ðŸ¤£.@cryptoheadlineNews, my oga you suppose know this matter aswear and the fact say you go bring statistics to checkmate this post don show me say you don dey choke eye for my banny wey I dey eyeðŸ¤£ abeg my oga no reason my matter I just dey try make sure we all dey vibe and ease nerves, no be plenty stress.

comments.author: iBaba
comments.body: The effort wey oga BrainBoss don put for this board, I still dey find the best way to appreciate am. Like how will one person be so simple, magnanimous and progressional at heart. Him just dey wish everyone wey be Naija person for here as well as him they wish himself. Oga BrainBoss carry everyone turn in brother. His down-to-earthliness is second to none. These reasons na why I talk say we no fit thank am enough.Senior men wey join this forum before me describe how e take be back in those days, how the board na just thread wey every body dey try come contribute them quota, how Naija dey put energy but we still be thread. Them talk say na with the help and expertise of them boss including BrainBoss himself na hin make this thread turn to a full board now. Now, we can boast of this like any other country out there.One thing wey dey give me joy and inspiration anywhere I find myself na how Naija person dey show muscle. Na how we dey take para regardless of our numbers. All of these no be government efforts, na individual effort, na efforts wey people like us don make. If na government own we want to follow, we won't have gotten here. Las Las, no Nigerian is less patriotic of the country, like the government itself. E be like na swear dey swear that place. Sha no be the matter dey here.Thank you to the newbies that have been encouraged by the senior men and bosses to come here and for their beliefs to actually come here. I was also once a newbie here and today, I don become full member and still counting. With no neutral or negative tag. At least that's an encouragement. Plenty senior men dey here wey be hero members and them still dey gallant with no neutral tags. Make sense.Thank you to the fams. The vibe is indeed flowing smoothly!
